typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		ContactNum as string,
		Country as string,
		OrderDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomersInput
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		Country as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		Product as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrdersInput
CustomersInput, OrdersInput join(CustomersInput@Country == OrdersInput@Country
	&& CustomersInput@OrderDate == OrdersInput@OrderDate,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LeftJoin
